cleaned_text: Nurse Practitioner, Pediatric Rheumatology, Dallas Location Type: On-site Job Number: 230000DK Category: Advanced Practice Provider Job Summary The Advanced Practice Provider (APP) will work collaboratively within a multidisciplinary team in the Rheumatology clinic for pediatric patients with new patient referral, internal ambulatory clinic referrals, hospital discharges, and hospital consults as needed. The APP is responsible for assessment, diagnosis, treatment, management, education, and health promotion and care coordination for patients and families. Clinic Hours: Mon-Fri Why UT Southwestern Join UT Southwestern on our mission to educate, discover, and heal.
